section.name: Resource Element
section.p: The <resource> element declares an available resource that may be used within a project as a dependency.

tr.td: If undefined the project key defaults to the name of the resource defined under the <info><name> element. If declared the key attribute value takes precidence. The value of the key is used as the unique identifier of the resource. <resource key="dpml-composition-control">
Declaration of the group, name, optional version, and associated resource types.
Declaration of the dependencies that this resource has on other resources.
